title: r/Prorevenge Drive Through My Garden? I'll DESTROY YOUR CAR!
description:
r/Prorevenge In today's episode, OP tells a story about a neighbor who would repeatedly drive through their nice garden. OP's father was having none of that, so he placed booby traps in the garden to destroy the car the next time the jerkfaces drove through! Serves you right! If you like this video and want to see more, subscribe to my channel for more daily Reddit content!
